channel.title: Moparscape construction skills & NPC spawning needs
channel.description: hey guys moparscape is great so far but i'd like to upgrade it a lil if ya know wat i mean, so i need help getting my filthy hangs on the construction skill to put into moparscape 3.0 and i was wondering if it is possiable to spawn NPC's standing in front of you so you can fight them or do the random events, anyways mopar i like it :D anyways boys and gals thx for reading this and replying peace :cool:

item.title: Moparscape construction skills & NPC spawning needs
item.dc:creator: @The_Prodigyscape The Prodigyscape
item.description:
@The_Prodigyscape wrote:

Ryan…
No…
Just don’t…
Seriously.

I have semi-working construction.
Not like most servers have you click and it makes a sideways wall that no-one else can see.
Mine is similar to runescapes but I’m still working on everything over level 45.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape construction skills & NPC spawning needs
item.dc:creator: @AD_LVL_7 AD LVL 7
item.description:
@AD_LVL_7 wrote:

i’m not releasing this code:

  1. costs me a lot of time to post this code, so i don’t
  2. if i post this i know this will lag the game very much
  3. ^=== so ppl will piss me off again couse it makes it laggy
    4.
    thats why i’ve trown my code away.

    this says more, its even harder to get it back (well do remember, but don’t say)
  4. yes pics, i can show, but it’ll be for tommorow or the day after tommorow
    first i’m going for a rune defender in warrior guild.

i think these already are enoufgh reasens why i’m not going to tell this code
i’m only saying that its possible
but you won’t get me back coding on that
i greed yall.[br][size=1]Posted at: July 19, 2006, 04:04:42 PM[/size][hr]lol, needed to be in my house anyway

lol, i’m greeting a ghost visitor.
